title._content: [Portrait of Carl Mirman and William P. Gottlieb, Washington, D.C., ca. Dec. 1941] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, Delia Potofsky, photographer. [Portrait of Carl Mirman and William P. Gottlieb, Washington, D.C., ca. Dec. 1941] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 254 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Mirman, Carl Gottlieb, William P. News photographers--1930-1950. Music critics--1930-1950. Format: Portrait photographs--1930-1950. Group portraits--1930-1950. Film negatives--1930-1950.
